name: Water
use: Universal solvent used as a baseline for many reactions.

name: Ethanol
use: Solvent and disinfectant; common lab cleaning agent.

name: Acetone
use: Polar aprotic solvent frequently used for cleaning glassware.

name: Benzene
use: Benchmark aromatic molecule and industrial feedstock.
hazards: Carcinogenic; handle in a fume hood

name: Sodium chloride
use: Source of chloride ions; used to adjust ionic strength.

name: Sulfuric acid
use: Strong acid for dehydrations and pH control.
